Package org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.util

Class NodeAssert

java.lang.Object
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.util.NodeAssert
public class NodeAssert extends Object
Fluent assertions for JCR nodes. Provides readable assertions for node properties, children, and structure.

Example usage: 

 repo.getNode("/hst:myproject")
     .assertPrimaryType("hst:hst")
     .assertHasNode("hst:configurations")
     .assertProperty("jcr:primaryType", "hst:hst");

    Creates a NodeAssert for the specified node.
